author: jeremias
msg: Changed README.txt to indicate that Forrest 0.9 is now required to build the website (because of the trademark-statement element in skinconf.xml).
Fixed legal page (contained wrong and incomplete information).
Made skinconf.xml well-formed and valid and fixed trademark information.
